page.title: 14THE SCHOOL TIMETABLE
page.content: The school follows a timetable which includes such activities as a story,counting,siging,pastry,painting, marching,singing games and of course play time.In the afternoons,evenings and at weekends the hall is used for a variety of activities: Monday:local band practice. Tuesday:wine club. independent order of foresters. Wednesday:women's institute.camera club.parish council.good companions. Thursday:dancing school.the fellowship.dog training club. Friday:dancing and acrobatic school. ballroom dancing. Saturday:family parties.weddings. Sunday:christenings.children's parties.
